Access all plugin-specific settings, inc: Access all plugin-specific settings, including performance, security, notifications, and retention rules.
Create and manage automated backup tasks: Create and manage automated backup tasks. You can also run jobs manually whenever needed.
Create and manage schedules to automate: Create and manage schedules to automate when your backup jobs run. Assign these to your backup jobs to ensure seamless operation.
Easily manage your existing backups: res: Easily manage your existing backups: restore, download, export, or extract files. This is your central hub for all backup-related actions.
Set up and manage where your backups are: Set up and manage where your backups are stored. Choose local or remote destinations for safe, secure, and flexible storage.
View all your alerts and notifications h: View all your alerts and notifications here.
View and manage all active backup, resto: View and manage all active backup, restore, and system tasks in real time. Click a task to see details or take action.
